title: How to run Simple Cave worlds from docker?

content.raw:
Hello,

can you please confirm how to run simulation for simple cave? I added note in [#!/osrf/subt/issues/367/cave-circuit-update-failure#comment-56681251](#!/osrf/subt/issues/367/cave-circuit-update-failure#comment-56681251), but it is working for others?

`./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest cloudsim_sim.ign circuit:=cave worldName:=simple_cave_01 robotName1:=X1F200L robotConfig1:=ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

gives me \(any my colleagues\) output

```
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboServer] File[libignition-launch-gazebo.so]
[Msg] Recording to [/tmp/ign/logs]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:447] Could not resolve file [simple_cave_01.sdf]
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[].
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboGui] File[libignition-launch-gazebogui.so]
Error [parser.cc:670] Could not find model.config or manifest.xml for the model
Error [parser.cc:340] File [] doesn't exist.
[Err] [Server.cc:144] Error Code 1 Msg: Unable to read file:
```

… which is very similar to original failure on CloudSim \([#!/osrf/subt/issues/360/simple-cave-on-cloudsim](#!/osrf/subt/issues/360/simple-cave-on-cloudsim)\)

Can you please let us know how you fixed it there?

Also note, that there is something strange with `osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest`

docker … the problem could be with overloaded networks now, but it seems that it has timestamp identical to 2 weeks old image.

thanks a lot for any hint

‌    Martin

p.s. we are not going to delete all dockers and re-download them again … that is something some of us already did … and the hash is the same

```
gpu@gpu-desktop:~/subt_docker$ docker pull osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest                                                                                
cloudsim_sim_latest: Pulling from osrf/subt-virtual-testbed                                                                                                             
Digest: sha256:de695ed6bdd5bb5b0dabaeedce0a9eebe943f73658cc463a2b5807cd0b33767e                                                                                         
Status: Image is up to date for osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest        
```

‌
content.html:
Hello,

can you please confirm how to run simulation for simple cave? I added note in #!/osrf/subt/issues/367/cave-circuit-update-failure#comment-56681251, but it is working for others?

./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest cloudsim_sim.ign circuit:=cave worldName:=simple_cave_01 robotName1:=X1F200L robotConfig1:=ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

gives me (any my colleagues) output

[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboServer] File[libignition-launch-gazebo.so]
[Msg] Recording to [/tmp/ign/logs]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:447] Could not resolve file [simple_cave_01.sdf]
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[].
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboGui] File[libignition-launch-gazebogui.so]
Error [parser.cc:670] Could not find model.config or manifest.xml for the model
Error [parser.cc:340] File [] doesn't exist.
[Err] [Server.cc:144] Error Code 1 Msg: Unable to read file:

… which is very similar to original failure on CloudSim (#!/osrf/subt/issues/360/simple-cave-on-cloudsim)

Can you please let us know how you fixed it there?

Also note, that there is something strange with osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest

docker … the problem could be with overloaded networks now, but it seems that it has timestamp identical to 2 weeks old image.

thanks a lot for any hint

‌ Martin

p.s. we are not going to delete all dockers and re-download them again … that is something some of us already did … and the hash is the same

gpu@gpu-desktop:~/subt_docker$ docker pull osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest                                                                                
cloudsim_sim_latest: Pulling from osrf/subt-virtual-testbed                                                                                                             
Digest: sha256:de695ed6bdd5bb5b0dabaeedce0a9eebe943f73658cc463a2b5807cd0b33767e                                                                                         
Status: Image is up to date for osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest
